yamadron: Plus in The .rar file ,the game name is Bust A "MOVE" NOT " GROOVE".

Of course it's "Bust a Move" and not "Bust a Groove" because the Japanese version was originally called "Bust a Move" with of course other versions being called "Bust a groove"

i tried burning the .iso file with dvd decrypter and cd writing wizard but both were not able to work on my  modded ps2.  the 2nd time, i used cd writing wizard and my ps2 was able to read the cd-r disc, but after selecting the cd icon, screen would turn black for few seconds and then return to same menu.  anybody know a solution for this? thanks

Download and works perfectly in ePSXe. Will seed for as long as I have space on my computer. The only problem I encountered was the lack of music, which can be fixed by enabling XA sound in sound config. Thank you so much for this!!
